thread.title: In Peru water is a high price for Lima's poor
thread.title_full: In Peru water is a high price for Lima's poor

author: Lyzza
title: In Peru water is a high price for Lima's poor
text: Posts: 646 In Peru water is a high price for Lima's poor Okay, do not read this if you are easily angered by the horrible treatment of the poor. Do not read this if you want to throw something, or break something, when you read about the intolerable suffering of others. AND, do not read this if seeing a Wall of Shame separating rich and poor (with freakin' razor wire on top) makes you want to vomit.
